A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Rian Johnson basically took the Episode 7 movie plot points and threw them out the window. Sometimes\, I’m trying to make a movie unique and disprove all the fan theories\, you end up making a movie that is so convoluted that it doesn’t follow even the same general direction as the previous movie. Effects and acting in this movie were good\, so I can’t give this movie 1 star. However\, this is one of the worst stories of a movie I have ever seen. I would go into details\, but I will avoid spoilers.
